oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abstract of provisions issued

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wainwright, William Alonzo, 1832-1904; United States -- Army -- Indiana Volunteer Infantry, 75th; United States -- Subsistence dept.; Armies -- Commissariat; Military hospitals; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Abstract of provisions issued from the 1st day of November 1862 to the 1st day of December 1862 to sick in hospital. Wainwright notes that he compared the specifics for subsistence actually required in hospital.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States -- Army -- Subsistence Dept.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: William Alonzo Wainwright, United States Assistant Quartermaster Records, 1861-1870
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The senior lieutenant present (here William Alonzo Wainwright) was entitled to the appointment of Assistant Commissary of Subsistence for the regiment. Wainwright functioned as both Assistant Commissary and Assistant Quartermaster of the 75th Indiana Infantry.
